name: Disney's Lilo & Stitch 2: Hamsterviel Havoc
description: Based on Disney Channel's hit television series Lilo & Stitch, this game is a sequel to the wildly popular Lilo & Stitch for Game Boy Advance. Kids can play as both Stitch and Lilo to rescue Nani and David who have been kidnapped by the evil Hämsterviel and taken onboard his spaceship. Complicating things, Hämsterviel has turned several other Experiments against Stitch. Players must capture each Experiment and harness their special power in order to defeat Hämsterviel.
